mapper.sql: VISIT_FLOW, VISIT_NAME, VISIT_TYPE_ID, VISIT_TYPE_NAME, ORDINAL, PROJ_FLOW, VISIT_WINDOW, IS_VISIT, IS_BASELINE, GROUP_FLOW, GROUP_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW

distinct
from PDSCI.EDC_VISIT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.EDC_VISIT (VISIT_FLOW, VISIT_NAME, VISIT_TYPE_ID, VISIT_TYPE_NAME, ORDINAL, PROJ_FLOW, VISIT_WINDOW, IS_VISIT, IS_BASELINE, GROUP_FLOW, GROUP_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{visitFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{projFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitWindow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVisit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isBaseline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
